an8.64:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā gayāyaṃ viharati gayāsīse.
an8.64:1.3: “pubbāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samāno obhāsaññeva kho sañjānāmi, no ca rūpāni passāmi. (1)
an8.64:2.2: ‘sace kho ahaṃ obhāsañceva sañjāneyyaṃ rūpāni ca passeyyaṃ;
an8.64:2.3: evaṃ me idaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ parisuddhataraṃ assā’ti.
an8.64:3.1: So kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, aparena samayena appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto obhāsañceva sañjānāmi, rūpāni ca passāmi;
an8.64:3.2: no ca kho tāhi devatāhi saddhiṃ santiṭṭhāmi sallapāmi sākacchaṃ samāpajjāmi. (2)
an8.64:4.2: ‘sace kho ahaṃ obhāsañceva sañjāneyyaṃ, rūpāni ca passeyyaṃ, tāhi ca devatāhi saddhiṃ santiṭṭheyyaṃ sallapeyyaṃ sākacchaṃ samāpajjeyyaṃ;
an8.64:4.3: evaṃ me idaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ parisuddhataraṃ assā’ti.
an8.64:5.1: So kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, aparena samayena appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto obhāsañceva sañjānāmi, rūpāni ca passāmi, tāhi ca devatāhi saddhiṃ santiṭṭhāmi sallapāmi sākacchaṃ samāpajjāmi;
an8.64:5.2: no ca kho tā devatā jānāmi—
an8.64:5.3: imā devatā amukamhā vā amukamhā vā devanikāyāti. (3)
an8.64:6.2: ‘sace kho ahaṃ obhāsañceva sañjāneyyaṃ, rūpāni ca passeyyaṃ, tāhi ca devatāhi saddhiṃ santiṭṭheyyaṃ sallapeyyaṃ sākacchaṃ samāpajjeyyaṃ, tā ca devatā jāneyyaṃ:
an8.64:6.3: “imā devatā amukamhā vā amukamhā vā devanikāyā”ti;
an8.64:6.4: evaṃ me idaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ parisuddhataraṃ assā’ti.
an8.64:7.1: So kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, aparena samayena appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto obhāsañceva sañjānāmi, rūpāni ca passāmi, tāhi ca devatāhi saddhiṃ santiṭṭhāmi sallapāmi sākacchaṃ samāpajjāmi, tā ca devatā jānāmi:
an8.64:7.2: ‘imā devatā amukamhā vā amukamhā vā devanikāyā’ti;
an8.64:7.3: no ca kho tā devatā jānāmi:
an8.64:7.4: ‘imā devatā imassa kammassa vipākena ito cutā tattha upapannā’ti …pe…
an8.64:7.6: ‘imā devatā imassa kammassa vipākena ito cutā tattha upapannā’ti;
an8.64:7.7: no ca kho tā devatā jānāmi:
an8.64:7.8: ‘imā devatā imassa kammassa vipākena evamāhārā evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvediniyo’ti …pe…
an8.64:7.10: ‘imā devatā imassa kammassa vipākena evamāhārā evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvediniyo’ti;
an8.64:7.11: no ca kho tā devatā jānāmi:
an8.64:7.15: no ca kho tā devatā jānāmi yadi vā me imāhi devatāhi saddhiṃ sannivutthapubbaṃ yadi vā na sannivutthapubbanti. (4–7.)
an8.64:8.2: ‘sace kho ahaṃ obhāsañceva sañjāneyyaṃ, rūpāni ca passeyyaṃ, tāhi ca devatāhi saddhiṃ santiṭṭheyyaṃ sallapeyyaṃ sākacchaṃ samāpajjeyyaṃ, tā ca devatā jāneyyaṃ:
an8.64:8.3: “imā devatā amukamhā vā amukamhā vā devanikāyā”ti, tā ca devatā jāneyyaṃ:
an8.64:8.4: “imā devatā imassa kammassa vipākena ito cutā tattha upapannā”ti, tā ca devatā jāneyyaṃ:
an8.64:8.5: “imā devatā evamāhārā evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvediniyo”ti, tā ca devatā jāneyyaṃ:
an8.64:8.6: “imā devatā evaṃdīghāyukā evaṃciraṭṭhitikā”ti, tā ca devatā jāneyyaṃ yadi vā me imāhi devatāhi saddhiṃ sannivutthapubbaṃ yadi vā na sannivutthapubbanti;
an8.64:8.7: evaṃ me idaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ parisuddhataraṃ assā’ti.
an8.64:9.1: So kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, aparena samayena appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto obhāsañceva sañjānāmi, rūpāni ca passāmi, tāhi ca devatāhi saddhiṃ santiṭṭhāmi sallapāmi sākacchaṃ samāpajjāmi, tā ca devatā jānāmi:
an8.64:9.2: ‘imā devatā amukamhā vā amukamhā vā devanikāyā’ti, tā ca devatā jānāmi:
an8.64:9.3: ‘imā devatā imassa kammassa vipākena ito cutā tattha upapannā’ti, tā ca devatā jānāmi:
an8.64:9.4: ‘imā devatā evamāhārā evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvediniyo’ti, tā ca devatā jānāmi:
an8.64:9.5: ‘imā devatā evaṃdīghāyukā evaṃciraṭṭhitikā’ti, tā ca devatā jānāmi yadi vā me devatāhi saddhiṃ sannivutthapubbaṃ yadi vā na sannivutthapubbanti. (8)
an8.64:10.1: Yāvakīvañca me, bhikkhave, evaṃ aṭṭhaparivaṭṭaṃ adhidevañāṇadassanaṃ na suvisuddhaṃ ahosi, neva tāvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ‘sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
an8.64:10.2: Yato ca kho me, bhikkhave, evaṃ aṭṭhaparivaṭṭaṃ adhidevañāṇadassanaṃ suvisuddhaṃ ahosi, athāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ‘sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ;
an8.64:10.4: akuppā me cetovimutti; ayamantimā jāti natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti.
